testsuite.title: Sensor Observation Service (SOS) 2.0 Conformance Test Suite
testsuite.description: This test suite verifies that a Sensor Observation Service (SOS) 2.0. implementation conforms to the relevant specifications: 1. OpenGIS Sensor Observation Service Implementation Specification, Version 2.0 [OGC 12-006] 2. OGC Web Services Common Specification, Version 1.1.0 [OGC 06-121r3] 3. Definition Identifier URNs in OGC Namespace, Version 1.1.0 [OGC 06-023r1] The test run arguments are summarized in the following table. The obligation descriptor can have the following values: M (mandatory), O (optional), or C (conditional).

testrunargument.name: service-url
testrunargument.description: A URI that refers to an XML representation of the service capabilities document. This document does not need to be obtained from the service under test (SUT), but it must describe the implementation under test (IUT). Ampersand ('&') characters appearing within a query parameter value must be percent-encoded as %26.

notes.note: The REST API supports only HTTP GET implementation and all tests are executed by default.
